titleStmt.title: Another great and admirable vjctory obtained by his Excellency the Lord Gen. Monk, against the Scottish forces: with the total routing and dispiersing of General Glencairns brigade; the number killed and taken; and the pursuing of them above three miles by Major Bridges, and Captain Babington. With several other remarkable occurrences, touching the transactions of military and state affairs.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
